name: My name is ZuzUBA.
beginning: This is my portfolio and a short presentation about myself.
about_pargraph1: Information Technology is my passion since I was 10. Programming became my passion since highschool, an I kept improving since. I see myself as an young talented person with a keen sense for details.
about_pargraph2:
In my spare time I like working on small personal projects, watching movies, playing video games, going out with my friends, playing football tennis and also working on my newly discovered talent cooking deserts.
Let's hope I get to be a Master Chef :D
